sides.name: Stuffed Garlic Knots
sides.ingredients: 10 large Garlic Knots stuffed with melted cheese and finished with a garlic buttery blend, grated parmesan and Italian herbs. Served with a dipping cup of marinara.

sides.name: Breadsticks
sides.ingredients: Crispy on the outside, soft and chewy on the inside. Seasoned with garlic and parmesan and served with marinara dipping sauce.

sides.name: Cheese Sticks
sides.ingredients: Fresh, oven-baked dough smothered with cheese and sprinkled with Italian seasoning. Served with marinara.

drinks.name: Diet Pepsi
drinks.ingredients: Light. Crisp. Refreshing. With zero sugar, zero calories, and zero carbs.

drinks.name: Mountain Dew
drinks.ingredients: Refreshes with a one-of-a-kind great taste.

drinks.name: Mist Twist
drinks.ingredients: A crisp, refreshing & caffeine free Lemon-Lime flavor soda with a splash of real juice.
